mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productId, productName, price, stock, productCate, regdate, updateDate, buyCount) VALUES(#{productId }, #{productName }, #{price }, #{stock }, #{productCate }, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{buyCount })
mapper.select: SELECT productId, productName, price, stock, productCate, regDate, updateDate, buyCount FROM product ORDER BY regdate ASC
